segments.text: Have you ever made any plan for your future ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course I have . I'd like to marry a handsome man and have two children if possible .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Not me . I'd like to be a bachelor forever .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't believe you can make it when you meet your Mrs . Right .
segments.speaker: S2
